channel.title: Can trigger autosave after triggering explosives room in Surface Tension
channel.description:
![blackmesa|690x388](upload://vWcq3eK6BxEc207Nqtwc0ZcEeQe.jpeg)
There's an autosave trigger right at the top of these stairs. If you're trying to clear the tripwire with a sprint jump (as I did) and fail, it's very easy to hit the trigger before the endless explosions kill you. I recommend moving the autosave back a little.
status and getpos info:
hostname: Black Mesa version : 100001/24 100001 insecure map : bm_c2a5e at: -157 x, 380 y, 96 z tags : players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) edicts : 1345 used of 4096 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 12 "Phantom Pantomime" STEAM_ID_PENDING 16:08 15 0 active loopback setpos -157.375580 380.797913 96.031250;setang 21.252764 164.066833 0.000000

blackmesa1920×1080 427 KB

There’s an autosave trigger right at the top of these stairs. If you’re trying to clear the tripwire with a sprint jump (as I did) and fail, it’s very easy to hit the trigger before the endless explosions kill you. I recommend moving the autosave back a little.
